verses.verse: ( The Song at the Sea) ( 70 5:1-31 ) אָ֣ז <WH227> ’āz Then יָשִֽׁיר־ <WH7891> yā·šîr- sang מֹשֶׁה֩ <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê and the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַשִּׁירָ֤ה <WH7892> haš·šî·rāh song הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> haz·zōṯ this לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> way·yō·mə·rū -: לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> lê·mōr - אָשִׁ֤ירָה <WH7891> ’ā·šî·rāh “ I will sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for גָאֹ֣ה <WH1342> ḡā·’ōh He is highly exalted גָּאָ֔ה <WH1342> gā·’āh .... ס֥וּס <WH5483> sūs The horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> wə·rō·ḵə·ḇōw and rider רָמָ֥ה <WH7411> rā·māh He has thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> ḇay·yām into the sea.

עָזִּ֤י <WH5797> ‘āz·zî is my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <WH2176> wə·zim·rāṯ and my song, יָ֔הּ <WH3050> yāh The LORD וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> way·hî- and He has become לִ֖י Prep│1cs ( lî) my לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה 3444 Prep-l│N-fs ( lî·šū·‘āh) salvation. זֶ֤ה 2088 Pro-ms ( zeh) He [is] אֵלִי֙ 410 N-msc│1cs ( ’ê·lî) my God, וְאַנְוֵ֔הוּ 5115 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConjImperf-1cs│3ms ( wə·’an·wê·hū) and I will praise Him, אֱלֹהֵ֥י 430 N-mpc ( ’ĕ·lō·hê) God, אָבִ֖י 1 N-msc│1cs ( ’ā·ḇî) my father’s וַאֲרֹמְמֶֽנְהוּ׃ 7311 Conj-w│V-Piel-ConjImperf-1cs│3mse ( wa·’ă·rō·mə·men·hū) and I will exalt Him.
יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš is a warrior מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> mil·ḥā·māh ..., יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> šə·mōw is His name.

מַרְכְּבֹ֥ת <WH4818> mar·kə·ḇōṯ chariots פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh Pharaoh’s וְחֵיל֖וֹ <WH2428> wə·ḥê·lōw and army יָרָ֣ה <WH3384> yā·rāh He has cast בַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> ḇay·yām into the sea; וּמִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> ū·miḇ·ḥar the finest שָֽׁלִשָׁ֖יו <WH7991> šā·li·šāw of his officers טֻבְּע֥וּ <WH2883> ṭub·bə·‘ū are drowned בְיַם־ <WH3220> ḇə·yam- Sea. ( Or the Sea of Reeds; also in verse 22) סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> sūp̄ in the Red

תְּהֹמֹ֖ת <WH8415> tə·hō·mōṯ The depths יְכַסְיֻ֑מוּ <WH3680> yə·ḵas·yu·mū have covered them; יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> yā·rə·ḏū they sank בִמְצוֹלֹ֖ת <WH4688> ḇim·ṣō·w·lōṯ [there] כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> kə·mōw- like אָֽבֶן׃ <WH68> ’ā·ḇen a stone.

יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> yə·mî·nə·ḵā Your right hand, יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, נֶאְדָּרִ֖י <WH142> ne’·dā·rî is majestic בַּכֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> bak·kō·aḥ in power; יְמִֽינְךָ֥ <WH3225> yə·mî·nə·ḵā Your right hand, יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, תִּרְעַ֥ץ <WH7492> tir·‘aṣ has shattered אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> ’ō·w·yêḇ the enemy.

וּבְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> ū·ḇə·rōḇ by Your great גְּאוֹנְךָ֖ <WH1347> gə·’ō·wn·ḵā majesty. תַּהֲרֹ֣ס <WH2040> ta·hă·rōs You overthrew קָמֶ֑יךָ <WH6965> qā·me·ḵā Your adversaries תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> tə·šal·laḥ You unleashed חֲרֹ֣נְךָ֔ <WH2740> ḥă·rō·nə·ḵā Your burning wrath; יֹאכְלֵ֖מוֹ <WH398> yō·ḵə·lê·mōw it consumed them כַּקַּֽשׁ׃ <WH7179> kaq·qaš like stubble.

וּבְר֤וּחַ <WH7307> ū·ḇə·rū·aḥ At the blast אַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH639> ’ap·pe·ḵā of Your nostrils נֶ֣עֶרְמוּ <WH6192> ne·‘er·mū piled up; מַ֔יִם <WH4325> ma·yim the waters נִצְּב֥וּ <WH5324> niṣ·ṣə·ḇū stood firm; כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> ḵə·mōw- like נֵ֖ד <WH5067> nêḏ a wall נֹזְלִ֑ים <WH5140> nō·zə·lîm the currents קָֽפְא֥וּ <WH7087> qā·p̄ə·’ū congealed תְהֹמֹ֖ת <WH8415> ṯə·hō·mōṯ the depths בְּלֶב־ <WH3820> bə·leḇ- in the heart יָֽם׃ <WH3220> yām of the sea.

אָמַ֥ר <WH559> ’ā·mar declared, אוֹיֵ֛ב <WH341> ’ō·w·yêḇ The enemy אֶרְדֹּ֥ף <WH7291> ’er·dōp̄ ‘ I will pursue, אַשִּׂ֖יג <WH5381> ’aś·śîḡ I will overtake. אֲחַלֵּ֣ק <WH2505> ’ă·ḥal·lêq I will divide שָׁלָ֑ל <WH7998> šā·lāl the spoils; תִּמְלָאֵ֣מוֹ <WH4390> tim·lā·’ê·mōw I will gorge myself on them נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> nap̄·šî . אָרִ֣יק <WH7324> ’ā·rîq I will draw חַרְבִּ֔י <WH2719> ḥar·bî my sword; תּוֹרִישֵׁ֖מוֹ <WH3423> tō·w·rî·šê·mōw will destroy them. ’ יָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> yā·ḏî my hand

נָשַׁ֥פְתָּ <WH5398> nā·šap̄·tā But You blew בְרוּחֲךָ֖ <WH7307> ḇə·rū·ḥă·ḵā with Your breath, כִּסָּ֣מוֹ <WH3680> kis·sā·mōw covered them. יָ֑ם <WH3220> yām and the sea צָֽלֲלוּ֙ <WH6749> ṣā·lă·lū They sank כַּֽעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <WH5777> ka·‘ō·w·p̄e·reṯ like lead בְּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> bə·ma·yim waters. אַדִּירִֽים׃ <WH117> ’ad·dî·rîm in the mighty

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mî- Who כָמֹ֤כָה <WH3644> ḵā·mō·ḵāh is like You, בָּֽאֵלִם֙ <WH410> bā·’ê·lim among the gods יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD? מִ֥י <WH4310> mî Who כָּמֹ֖כָה <WH3644> kā·mō·ḵāh is like You — נֶאְדָּ֣ר <WH142> ne’·dār majestic בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> baq·qō·ḏeš in holiness, נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> nō·w·rā revered תְהִלֹּ֖ת <WH8416> ṯə·hil·lōṯ with praises, עֹ֥שֵׂה <WH6213> ‘ō·śêh performing פֶֽלֶא׃ <WH6382> p̄e·le wonders?
נָטִ֙יתָ֙ <WH5186> nā·ṭî·ṯā You stretched out יְמִ֣ינְךָ֔ <WH3225> yə·mî·nə·ḵā Your right hand, תִּבְלָעֵ֖מוֹ <WH1104> tiḇ·lā·‘ê·mōw swallowed them up. אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ and the earth

נָחִ֥יתָ <WH5148> nā·ḥî·ṯā You will lead בְחַסְדְּךָ֖ <WH2617> ḇə·ḥas·də·ḵā With loving devotion ( Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.) עַם־ <WH5971> ‘am- the people ז֣וּ <WH2098> zū ... גָּאָ֑לְתָּ <WH1350> gā·’ā·lə·tā You have redeemed; נֵהַ֥לְתָּ <WH5095> nê·hal·tā You will guide them בְעָזְּךָ֖ <WH5797> ḇə·‘āz·zə·ḵā with Your strength אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to נְוֵ֥ה <WH5116> nə·wêh dwelling. קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> qāḏ·še·ḵā Your holy

שָֽׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> šā·mə·‘ū will hear עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ‘am·mîm The nations יִרְגָּז֑וּן <WH7264> yir·gā·zūn [and] tremble; חִ֣יל <WH2427> ḥîl anguish אָחַ֔ז <WH270> ’ā·ḥaz will grip יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yō·šə·ḇê the dwellers פְּלָֽשֶׁת׃ <WH6429> pə·lā·šeṯ of Philistia.

אָ֤ז <WH227> ’āz Then נִבְהֲלוּ֙ <WH926> niḇ·hă·lū will be dismayed; אַלּוּפֵ֣י <WH441> ’al·lū·p̄ê the chiefs אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> ’ĕ·ḏō·wm of Edom אֵילֵ֣י <WH352> ’ê·lê the leaders מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mō·w·’āḇ of Moab; יֹֽאחֲזֵ֖מוֹ <WH270> yō·ḥă·zê·mōw will seize רָ֑עַד <WH7461> rā·‘aḏ trembling נָמֹ֕גוּ <WH4127> nā·mō·ḡū will melt away כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kōl ..., יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> yō·šə·ḇê those who dwell כְנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ḵə·nā·‘an in Canaan

תִּפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> tip·pōl will fall עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·hem on them. אֵימָ֙תָה֙ <WH367> ’ê·mā·ṯāh and terror וָפַ֔חַד <WH6343> wā·p̄a·ḥaḏ and dread בִּגְדֹ֥ל <WH1419> biḡ·ḏōl By the power זְרוֹעֲךָ֖ <WH2220> zə·rō·w·‘ă·ḵā of Your arm יִדְּמ֣וּ <WH1826> yid·də·mū they will be as still כָּאָ֑בֶן <WH68> kā·’ā·ḇen as a stone עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until יַעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> ya·‘ă·ḇōr pass by, עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> ‘am·mə·ḵā Your people יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, עַֽד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until יַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> ya·‘ă·ḇōr pass by. עַם־ <WH5971> ‘am- the people ז֥וּ <WH2098> zū - קָנִֽיתָ׃ <WH7069> qā·nî·ṯā You have bought

תְּבִאֵ֗מוֹ <WH935> tə·ḇi·’ê·mōw You will bring them in וְתִטָּעֵ֙מוֹ֙ <WH5193> wə·ṯiṭ·ṭā·‘ê·mōw and plant them בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> bə·har on the mountain נַחֲלָֽתְךָ֔ <WH5159> na·ḥă·lā·ṯə·ḵā of Your inheritance — מָכ֧וֹן <WH4349> mā·ḵō·wn the place, לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֛ <WH3427> lə·šiḇ·tə·ḵā for Your dwelling, פָּעַ֖לְתָּ <WH6466> pā·‘al·tā You have prepared יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, מִקְּדָ֕שׁ <WH4720> miq·qə·ḏāš the sanctuary, אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy O Lord, כּוֹנְנ֥וּ <WH3559> kō·wn·nū have established. יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3027> yā·ḏe·ḵā Your hands
יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> yim·lōḵ will reign לְעֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·lām forever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> wā·‘eḏ and ever! ”

כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî For when בָא֩ <WH935> ḇā went ס֨וּס <WH5483> sūs horses, פַּרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh Pharaoh’s בְּרִכְבּ֤וֹ <WH7393> bə·riḵ·bōw chariots, וּבְפָרָשָׁיו֙ <WH6571> ū·ḇə·p̄ā·rā·šāw and horsemen בַּיָּ֔ם <WH3220> bay·yām into the sea, וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <WH7725> way·yā·šeḇ back יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·hem over them. אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מֵ֣י <WH4325> mê brought the waters הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hay·yām of the sea וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê But the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> hā·lə·ḵū walked בַיַּבָּשָׁ֖ה <WH3004> ḇay·yab·bā·šāh on dry ground. בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> bə·ṯō·wḵ through הַיָּֽם׃פ <WH3220> hay·yām the sea

וַתִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> wat·tiq·qaḥ took מִרְיָ֨ם <WH4813> mir·yām Then Miriam הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <WH5031> han·nə·ḇî·’āh the prophetess, אֲח֧וֹת <WH269> ’ă·ḥō·wṯ sister, אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron’s אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַתֹּ֖ף <WH8596> hat·tōp̄ a tambourine בְּיָדָ֑הּ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏāh in her hand, וַתֵּצֶ֤אןָ <WH3318> wat·tê·ṣe·nā followed her כָֽל־ <WH3605> ḵāl and all הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> han·nā·šîm the women אַחֲרֶ֔יהָ <WH310> ’a·ḥă·re·hā ... בְּתֻפִּ֖ים <WH8596> bə·ṯup·pîm with tambourines וּבִמְחֹלֹֽת׃ <WH4246> ū·ḇim·ḥō·lōṯ and dancing.
